name: setup
description: Setup temporary voice channels for your Discord server.

lobby.name: lobby
lobby.description: The voice channel to create new temp-voice-channels.

errors.no-access-container:
```
The bot cannot access the container category chanenl.
```
errors.no-access-lobby:
```
The bot cannot access the lobby chanenl.
```
errors.no-perm:
```The bot does not have permissions to manage channels in your server.
```
Go to **Server Settings**>**Roles** to grant permissions to the bot.
